name: ECON 135
title: Corporate Finance
description: An analysis of financial policies of business enterprises. Topics include cash flow analysis, stock and bond valuation, asset pricing models, capital budgeting, financial market institutions, and financial planning.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ECON 10A; and ECON 100A or ECON 100M; and ECON 113.

class_notes: Enrollment in and attendance of secondary sections is strongly encouraged for student success in this course.
